tldr: TL;DR: Tesla surges in Q3 earnings, while McDonald's and Starbucks decline.
title: Tesla shines; stocks surge amidst mixed market sentiments.
summary: Tesla shares rose 11% on strong earnings; McDonald's fell 7% amid an E. coli investigation.
whyMatters: Tesla's Q3 earnings surge, leading to an 11% rise in shares. Pre-market insights gain importance as U.S. futures drop.
bulletPoints:
• Tesla reports Q3 earnings surge while McDonald's and Starbucks stocks decline
  • CCSC Technology Holdings soars 122%; SaverOne shares decline by 25.9%
  • Pre-market insights crucial for guiding intraday traders

tldr: TL;DR: Pre-market review reveals Deckers Outdoor spiking by 14% after Q2 earnings beat.
title: Stocks surge and plummet pre-market, Tesla leads with 13% gain.
summary: Deckers Outdoor and Tesla show strong pre-market gains on robust earnings, while Capri Holdings face setbacks.
whyMatters: Pre-market insights for traders on earnings, tech and healthcare sectors fluctuating before market opens.
bulletPoints:
• Deckers Outdoor up 14% after earnings beat
  • Capri Holdings faces challenges amid earnings
  • Sector performance mixed due to economic uncertainties
